data.comment: Today's referee, Eduardo Galvan Basulto, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 2, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 6, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rogelio Funes Mori hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Monterrey for Monterrey.
In the minute 9, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
The match at Estadio BBVA Bancomer has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maximiliano Meza, who is down injured.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 16, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tigres will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Monterrey.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Leonardo Fernandez gives Tigres a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 24, Luis Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
Tigres are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 27, Monterrey's Maximiliano Meza looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sebastian Vegas is booked for the home team.
In Monterrey, Hugo Ayala (Tigres) misses the target with a header.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick Monterrey.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, Important block from the Tigres defence as Miguel Layun fires in a strike for Monterrey.
At Estadio BBVA Bancomer, Monterrey are penalized for being offside.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 45, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Nicolas Sanchez (Monterrey) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Ake Arnaud Loba of Monterrey is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Rogelio Funes Mori for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 50, Tigres have a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Tigres throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Free kick Tigres.
In the minute 55, In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 60, Monterrey's Miguel Layun breaks free at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 61, Dorlan Pabon is replacing Miguel Layun for the home team.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In Monterrey, Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 63, Daniel Alexis Parra is on a sub for Jesus Gallardo for Monterrey.
Throw-in Tigres.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 65, Nicolas Lopez is replacing Leonardo Fernandez for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
The home team have replaced Carlos Rodriguez with Arturo Gonzalez. This is the third substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
In the minute 71, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey make their fourth substitution with Matias Kranevitter replacing Celso Ortiz.
Rogelio Funes Mori gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monterrey.
In the minute 73, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Maximiliano Meza with Jose Alvarado.
Julian Quinones is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
It seems as if Julian Quinones is unable to continue. Eduardo Vargas replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 79, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Goal! Tigres extend their lead to 0-2 through Nicolas Lopez.
Great play from Eduardo Vargas to set up the goal.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Throw-in Tigres.
Monterrey pushes forward through Dorlan Pabon, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 83, Eduardo Galvan Basulto waits before resuming play because Nahuel Guzman for Tigres is still down.
Nahuel Guzman is back on the pitch.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 84, Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Monterrey.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to Tigres's area.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
In Monterrey Monterrey attack through Jose Alvarado. The finish is off target, however.
Tigres have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Monterrey throw-in in Tigres's half.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) gets a yellow card.
